solution_line_template: There are {num_bicycles} bicycles x {wheels_per_bicycle} wheels/bicycle = <<{num_bicycles}*{wheels_per_bicycle}={bicycle_wheels}>>{bicycle_wheels} bicycle wheels.
There are {num_cars} cars x {wheels_per_car} wheels/car = <<{num_cars}*{wheels_per_car}={car_wheels}>>{car_wheels} car wheels.
In total there are {bicycle_wheels} bicycle wheels + {car_wheels} car wheels = <<{bicycle_wheels}+{car_wheels}={total_wheels}>>{total_wheels} wheels in the garage
